content:
As some folks probably know, there is a virtual dask summit planned for May 19th - 21, 2021: https://summit.dask.org/
Users of all skill levels are welcome to the summit. And if you've been doing some cool work with dask that others would benefit from, please consider submitting a talk proposal :slight_smile:
For folks planning to attend the summit, the schedule is now online https://summit.dask.org/schedule/
